Summary: BETTER THAN "5 HOUR ENERGY" AND GREAT FOR A HANGOVER
text:
Yessiree- this is the same sweet coffee-esque sugar buzz that you'll find at most convenience stores and gas stations. Is it a chemical abomination? You bet! Does it taste great with a day-old buttered roll in a wax-paper sleeve? Absolutely! Here is the real thing that fogs your windows and leaves a vanilla aroma in its aftermath. It is sickeningly sweet and guaranteed to snap you out of a hangover when followed with a day-old roll or bagel with cream cheese. Nothing short of an American classic and friend of the open road.

It's not just about the sugar. They actually put 30mg of caffeine into this concoction of--well, you really don't need to know.

It's cheaper than the $1.75 at the gas station (around $.45 a paper cup).

It's not actually coffee-- but it hits the spot when you're down and out and need something more for breakfast than a Baby Ruth Bar.

Go ahead- you know that you want this, uh...whatever it is. Mmmmm! Now THAT'S what I'm talking about!
